hc_ww_covid.long_name: Wastewater SARS-CoV-2 (N2 gene) viral activity level
hc_ww_covid.short_description: Weekly weighted average SARS-CoV-2 (N2 gene) signal detected in wastewater across Canadian monitoring sites.
hc_ww_covid.long_description: SARS-CoV-2 viral RNA concentrations (normalized copies per mL) detected at wastewater treatment plants across Canada, targeting the N2 gene. Data is aggregated weekly at the provincial and national level as a population-weighted mean across monitoring sites.
hc_ww_covid.statement: In {location}, the wastewater COVID-19 signal was {hc_ww_covid}.

health_infobase_wastewater.name: Health Infobase Canada - Wastewater Surveillance
health_infobase_wastewater.description: The Canadian COVID-19 Wastewater Surveillance Program monitors viral signals in wastewater from treatment plants across Canada. The program tracks SARS-CoV-2 (N2 gene), Influenza A, Influenza B, and RSV. Data is collected from multiple monitoring sites and aggregated at site, provincial, and national levels on a weekly basis. The weighted average (w_avg) represents the population-weighted mean viral signal across sites within each geographic area.
